description: This Dart source file defines the RoomsListScreen widget in a Flutter app, which displays a list of rooms with loading, error, and empty states. It manages fetching rooms data via a service, handles navigation to room details, and constructs the UI accordingly.

classes.name: RoomsListScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of rooms with loading, error, and empty states.

classes.name: _RoomsListScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the RoomsListScreen, handling data fetching, state management, and UI building.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, sets up the RoomsService, and fetches room data.

methods.name: _fetchRooms
methods.description: Async method fetching rooms data from the service, updating loading and error states accordingly.

methods.name: _openDetails
methods.description: Navigates to the room details page when a room is tapped.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree based on current state, displaying loading indicator, error message, empty message, or list of rooms.
